title: Salvador's Coffee House
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, International, Western, Beer/Wine, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Two of the owners are vegetarian so the menu reflects this. Many menu items have vegetarian options, including a veggie burger made from chickpeas. Also some salads, sandwiches, pasta, and burritos can be ordered veggie. Uses organic produce and hormone-free meat whenever possible, and staff is knowledgeable about veg diet. Cozy, artistic atmosphere with 1st floor as non-smoking area, adsl ports available but no Wi-Fi.
streetAddress: 76 Wen Lin Jie Wen Hua Xiang
